com.adobe.fd.signatures.pki.client.types.prefs

Class CommonPreferencesImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.HashMap<String,Object>
        • com.adobe.fd.signatures.pki.client.types.prefs.PreferencesMap
          • com.adobe.fd.signatures.pki.client.types.prefs.CommonPreferencesImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommonPreferences, Serializable, Cloneable, Map<String,Object>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CRLPreferencesImpl, OCSPPreferencesImpl, TSPPreferencesImpl

    public abstract class CommonPreferencesImpl
extends PreferencesMap
implements CommonPreferences
    PreferencesStore common across different operations. Currently only revocation check option is common.
    See Also:
